alert.note: Alert for Sandusky (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 1:10PM EDT until August 25 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Ohio, including the following county, Sandusky. * WHEN...Until 315 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Several roads remain closed across the county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 109 PM EDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fremont, Bellevue, Clyde, Gibsonburg, Woodville, Elmore, Green Springs, Ballville, Risingsun, Lindsey, Helena, Burgoon, Stony Prairie, Vickery and Whites Landing.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
